Html:
Hello,

I am looking for a way to calculate GPS position accuracy, similar to Android's position accuracy, no luck so far.

The only criteria I can probably use to evaluate quality of GPS location is PositionDilutionOfPrecision.

Would be nice to have accuracy though, similar to Google Maps on Android.

Any ideas?

thanks will try to find it :-) in Chinese rugged windows mobile 6/1
data collection device.
Anyway, HorizontalPositionDilutionOfPrecision can be used, the less
this value is the better position quality...
